title: Withdraw a Life Insurance Application
description: An applicant has changed their mind and wants to withdraw their pending life insurance application.

tasks.description: Identify the applicant and their pending application.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the correct application file.

tasks.description: Confirm the applicant's request to withdraw.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent speaks with the applicant and confirms their intent.

tasks.description: Close the application file in the system as 'Withdrawn by Applicant'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the application status to closed.
